segments.text: Right Rebecca . Now I see that after graduating from University your first job was ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For a local paper in York called the York Herald . Actually , I started with them as an intern in the beginning . I was really keen on getting some experience in the journalistic world , and this seemed like a good first step .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They seemed impressed , and offered me a position as a junior local news reporter . I ended up staying two years there actually . I was in charge of the sports news section of the newspaper . I really enjoyed it there , and it really helped me build my skills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes I see . But you decided to leave them in 2006 , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that â€™ s right . My husband and I moved to London , and so I managed to find a position with a National newspaper based in London .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , in some ways it was a step down from my previous job but it did offer me much better prospects for the future .
segments.speaker: S2
